00046 class SIM_API cComponentType : public cNoncopyableOwnedObject
00047 {
00048   protected:
00049     std::string qualifiedName;
00050 
00051     typedef std::map<std::string, cParImpl *> StringToParMap;
00052     StringToParMap sharedParMap;
00053 
00054     struct Less {bool operator()(cParImpl *a, cParImpl *b) const;};
00055     typedef std::set<cParImpl *, Less> ParImplSet;
00056     ParImplSet sharedParSet;
00057 
00058   protected:
00059     friend class cComponent;
00060     friend class cModule;
00061     friend class cChannel;
00062     friend class cPar;
00063     friend class cGate;
00064 
00065     // internal: returns the properties for this component.
00066     virtual cProperties *getProperties() const = 0;
00067 
00068     // internal: returns the properties of parameter
00069     virtual cProperties *getParamProperties(const char *paramName) const = 0;
00070 
00071     // internal: returns the properties of gate
00072     virtual cProperties *getGateProperties(const char *gateName) const = 0;
00073 
00074     // internal: returns the properties of a submodule.
00075     // (Subcomponent type is needed because with the NED "like" syntax,
00076     // we need the runtime type not the NED type of the submodule.)
00077     virtual cProperties *getSubmoduleProperties(const char *submoduleName, const char *submoduleType) const = 0;
00078 
00079     // internal: returns the properties of a contained connection.
00080     // (Subcomponent type is needed because with the NED "like" syntax,
00081     // we need the runtime type not the NED type of the submodule.)
00082     virtual cProperties *getConnectionProperties(int connectionId, const char *channelType) const = 0;
00083 
00084     // internal: sharedParMap access
00085     cParImpl *getSharedParImpl(const char *key) const;
00086     void putSharedParImpl(const char *key, cParImpl *value);
00087 
00088     // internal: sharedParSet access
00089     cParImpl *getSharedParImpl(cParImpl *p) const;
00090     void putSharedParImpl(cParImpl *p);
00091 
00092   public:
00093     // internal: delegates to the similar NedTypeInfo method
00094     virtual std::string getPackageProperty(const char *name) const {return "";}
00095 
00096   public:
00102     cComponentType(const char *qname=NULL);
00103 
00107     virtual ~cComponentType();
00109 
00128     virtual const char *getFullName() const  {return qualifiedName.c_str();}
00130 
00135     static cComponentType *find(const char *qname);
00136 
00141     static cComponentType *get(const char *qname);
00142 };
00143

00152 class SIM_API cModuleType : public cComponentType
00153 {
00154     friend class cModule;
00155     friend class cCompoundModule;
00156   protected:
00160     virtual cModule *createModuleObject() = 0;
00161 
00168     virtual void addParametersAndGatesTo(cModule *mod) = 0;
00169 
00176     virtual void setupGateVectors(cModule *mod) = 0;
00177 
00187     virtual void buildInside(cModule *mod) = 0;
00188 
00194     cModule *instantiateModuleClass(const char *classname);
00195 
00196   public:
00202     cModuleType(const char *qname=NULL);
00204 
00210     virtual bool isNetwork() const = 0;
00212 
00215 
00222     virtual cModule *create(const char *name, cModule *parentmod);
00223 
00229     virtual cModule *create(const char *name, cModule *parentmod, int vectorsize, int index);
00230 
00244     virtual cModule *createScheduleInit(const char *name, cModule *parentmod);
00246 
00251     static cModuleType *find(const char *qname);
00252 
00257     static cModuleType *get(const char *qname);
00258 };
